text: Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche allahe te'omlokaka praraesa karaaba jannatata yara talata nadisamuha prabahita; kintu yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamte bhoga-bilasata matta thake arau ahara karae se'idarae yidarae catuspada jantuborae ahara karae; arau jahanname'i sihamtara abasasthala
